snippet: As the Giants began preparations for Sunday’s game, many of the players trained their focus on the positive developments that have taken place since the last time they saw the Packers.
abstract: New York Giants are preparing for their NFC playoff game against Green Bay Packers with a focus on the positive developments that have taken place, particularly on defense, since the last time teams met.
lead_paragraph: As the Giants began preparations for Sunday’s game, many of the players trained their focus on the positive developments that have taken place since the last time they saw the Packers.

headline.seo: As Giants’ Confidence Grows, the Defense Flourishes
headline.main: Giants Find Missing Part for Rematch: Confidence
headline.print_headline: Giants’ Defense Plans to Bring Missing Part Into Rematch: Confidence
